title: This 3-Ingredient Limoncello Spritz Tastes Like a Trip to the Amalfi Coast
full_text:
This 3-Ingredient Limoncello Spritz Tastes Like a Trip to the Amalfi Coast
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 cocktail
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
1 1/2
fluid ounces
limoncello
4
fluid ounces
brut
Prosecco
1
fluid ounce
club soda
Lemon
slices
for garnish
Directions
Fill a wine glass halfway up with ice. Pour the limoncello over, then add the Prosecco and club soda.
Serious Eats / Amanda Suarez
Using a cocktail stirrer, stir to mix and garnish with 1 to 2 lemon slices.
Serious Eats / Amanda Suarez
Cocktails
Recipes
Lemon
Summer Drinks
Summer
